name: Bowl of Ancient Blood
description: Able to revive an elder vampire. Return to the swamp capitol for a reward.

name: Arguel's Bloody Helm
description: Proof of the high marshal's death. Return to the plains capitol for a reward.

name: White Cartouche of Victory
description: Proof you defeated Elesh Norn. Return to the plains capitol for a reward.

name: Warding Statue Torso
description: One third of what you need to return to the swamp capitol for a reward.

name: Warding Statue Skirt
description: One third of what you need to return to the swamp capitol for a reward.

name: Warding Statue Arms
description: One third of what you need to return to the swamp capitol for a reward.

name: Map to the Hostages
description: Shows how to rescue some prisoners. Return to the island capitol for a reward.

name: The Luckiest Clover
description: Feels gross, but somehow intact. Return to the forest capitol for a reward.

name: Cheese of Bees
description: Smells delicious and attracts tons of bees. Return to the forest capitol for a reward.

name: One Thousand Chickens
description: Very loud and delicious. Return to the mountain capitol for a reward.

name: Blue Cartouche of Victory
description: Proof you defeated Jin-Gitaxias. Return to the island capitol for a reward.

name: Everflowing Watering Can
description: Great for agriculture. Return to the plains capitol for a reward.

name: Black Cartouche of Victory
description: Proof you defeated Sheoldred. Return to the swamp capitol for a reward.

name: Tome of Temporal Repair
description: Shows how to fix time distortions. Return to the island capitol for a reward.

name: Red Cartouche of Victory
description: Proof you defeated Urabrask. Return to the mountain capitol for a reward.

name: Green Cartouche of Victory
description: Proof you defeated Vorinclex. Return to the forest capitol for a reward.

name: Victory Standard
description: The victory is yours now. Return to the mountain capitol for a reward.

name: Staff of Speed
description: Greatly increases speed for a while.

name: Staff of Flight
description: Fly over rough terrain for a while.

name: Staff of Healing
description: Recovers your life after a lost duel without visiting a town.

name: Staff of Invisibility
description: Hide from enemies for a while.

name: Bronze Blessing of Speed
description: Move 25% faster. Passive, in a special slot.

name: Silver Blessing of Speed
description: Move 50% faster. Passive, in a special slot.

name: Gold Blessing of Speed
description: Move twice as fast. Passive, in a special slot.

name: Manasight Stone
description: Grants Manasight, to see enemy colors.

name: Captive Soul of a Priest
description: Only makes things harder; no benefits. Uses a special slot.

name: Captive Soul of a Saint
description: Makes things much harder; no benefits. Uses a special slot.

name: Captive Soul of a Knight
description: A stolen soul that gives you 1 life. Uses a special slot.

name: Captive Soul of a Noble
description: A stolen soul that gives you 2 life. Uses a special slot.

name: Captive Soul of a Royal
description: A stolen soul that gives you 3 life. Uses a special slot.
